about_the_game:
Let's solve a scrambled cube in its unfolded state. Manipulate the cube pieces of a randomly mixed cube to solve it.


Pressing the button briefly will cause the cube to be shuffled a set number of times.

If you keep holding down the mouse button, the timer won't start, allowing you up to 15 seconds of inspection time to examine the shuffled cube.

Releasing the mouse button or moving away from it will start the timer and initiate the cube solving process.


Click on a cube piece and manipulate it by dragging up, down, left, or right to complete the cube.

After solving the cube, the attempt number and the time taken by the timer will be recorded.
Additionally, you can choose to forfeit the attempt by pressing the button.

In the demo version, you can play with a 3x3x3 cube and three different nets.
